overview: Sweet Repeat Records is a record shop with a convenient location in downtown Gettysburg, offering a selection of reasonably priced vinyl records, CDs, and cassettes.
history: Founded as part of Destination Gettysburg's travel council in 1955, with the current store location established at some point after 2000. No notable history mentioned on the website.

inventory_focus.new vs used: Both new and used records available

services.buy/sell/trade: Yes, they buy, sell, and trade vinyl, CDs, and cassettes.
services.online store: Yes, but no link provided on the website
services.shipping: No information on shipping policies or costs

events.hosting events: No specific events listed, but Destination Gettysburg hosts various events throughout the year

staff.notable staff/owner info: No notable staff or owner information provided on the website

hours_location.store hours: Thursday - Monday: 11 am - 5 pm, Tuesday & Wednesday: Closed

community_role.engaging with local music scene: Part of Destination Gettysburg's efforts to promote tourism and support local businesses
